title: database and multiple users
author: fadace
body_snippet:
1) Not possible to use a Windows Authentication to connect to the MS SQL Database

2) Each user using the database will access to any connection string. It's not really secure. Workaround, not really professional : create a database by user. Should be great to add a filter  "user" column into the table tblcons 

|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7008  |

iterations.description: The report lacks reproducible steps and clear expected-versus-actual behavior and appears stale pending retest on current builds.
Multiple users using SQL storage encounter data loss and security issues due to lack of concurrency control and user permissions.
